actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 501 of title 37, United States Code, to exempt from a maximum limitation of 60 days certain payments to members of the uniformed services for unused accrued leave.

summary.text: Exempts members of the uniformed services and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration and officers of the Regular or Reserve Corps of the Public Health Service from the 60-day limitation on payments for unused accrued leave if such personnel die after September 1, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 501 of title 37, United States Code, to exempt from a maximum limitation of 60 days certain payments to members of the uniformed services for unused accrued leave.
